about:
Hello, I have a university degree in graphic design, although as a child I was a talented artist. My work is meaningful, subtle, clean and memorable. Through years of design experience I have excelled in corporate design.
  I love a good book and a coffee...
  If you like my style and portfolio you can invite me to work and we will create something fantastic together; or you can invite me to your contest and I'll make some special proposals for you.

about: I've been a Graphic Designer for the past 23 years now, and have been freelance for the last 10. I've previously worked in many genres of design, gaining a vast array of experience. These have included a print studio, a banner firm and an Architect firm, covering everything from logos to large format, hand sketching to vector design. I am very passionate about my work, and love how every new project is completely different, it’s what keeps the job so enjoyable!

about:
Hi,
  I’m Thao, a Designer & Illustrator.
  I knew I loved drawing after I had attended a lettering class at my primary school. What I didn't realize until much later was that I could do something I loved and get paid at the same time, while also helping others. I came back to drawing and eventually started learning graphic design in the summer of 2019, right after getting my degree in foreign languages.
  I love it, and I can't wait to design a gorgeous logo for you.

about: My passion for creativity does not discriminate. I find as much joy in translating numbers to infographic slides as I would working on a DIY car ramp for my toddler son (and occasionally moving furniture around which my husband hates). It’s this same passion that led me to Singapore almost a decade ago enabling me to become what I will call a tireless seeker of creative things.

about:

  I am a graphic Designer. I started actively at 99design starting in August 2018.
  I am specialist in the field of logo design, business card design, T-shirt design, flyer design and label design. I always try my best to make the client feel satisfied with my design. I always try to give the best to my client.

about: Bonjour ! Je suis Marie, 25 ans, graphiste et illustratrice en freelance. Si j'ai un parcours assez atypique, j'ai passé trois ans à l'Institut d'Etudes Politiques (Sciences Po) de Lyon, j'ai décidé de changer complètement de voie il y a un an pour me tourner vers ma passion, la conception artistique. Depuis, je n'ai de cesse de me former, et j'ai déjà eu plusieurs projets avec des entreprises, des ONG ou des particuliers.

about:
Hi, I'm Ileana. I have a B.A. in Graphic Design, Buenos Aires University. I taught college, and over the last 20 years, I have been working in Corporate Design as an Art Director for Toyota, LoJack, Securitas, L'Oreal, OSDE, and many other companies.
  I also worked as a planner for large-scale events for top-of-the-line companies, including the launches for the 2012 Toyota Corolla and Toyota 86.

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. Then I went to work with several international design studios for 4 years where I worked as an Art Director, this led me to fall more in love with branding and illustration, currently I am working only as a freelance.

about:
Hello :) , I'm an experienced creative thinker,  graduated from Art school .
  I create art that allows me to feel free, to discover myself, to express my opinion, to transmit love.
  My skills extend from graphic creation (posters - visual identities - logos ...) and digital illustration to User experience .
  I master the Adobe suite (Photoshop, XD, Illustrator, PremiÃ¨re ..etc.)
  I like to explore alternative solutions to problems and I have an open mind about what will work best.
